content.raw:
Ah, I see. So it doesn't work with `unicode_literals` imported from `__future__`.

What a dumb bug. The fix is obvious and I'm surprised people are debating instead of acting, but maybe it's because nobody has writenn the code - I'll have a quick look to see if it's within my abilities to submit a patch to numpy, and likely monkeypatch numpy from labscript_utils to apply the change in the meantime. So some sort of hack is necessary, yours or otherwise. I'll look into it.
content.html:
Ah, I see. So it doesn't work with unicode_literals imported from __future__.

What a dumb bug. The fix is obvious and I'm surprised people are debating instead of acting, but maybe it's because nobody has writenn the code - I'll have a quick look to see if it's within my abilities to submit a patch to numpy, and likely monkeypatch numpy from labscript_utils to apply the change in the meantime. So some sort of hack is necessary, yours or otherwise. I'll look into it.
